attributes.additional_details: With the regeneration of Wharton Park in Durham city centre we would like to see the addition of a skatepark.  We previously successfully petitioned for this however, the local council have now 'cut' the skatepark from the regeneration plan.  The young people would love a skatepark to be accessible in the city centre which they are able to use.  This will discourage them from skating in the Market Place, which other members of the public dislike.

rejection.details: This is one for your local council, but you might like to contact your local MP about this also.
